body.p: Used to specify the content that should be generated for each matching result from a query. The action should be contained within a template.XULElem("query") or template.XULElem("rule") element.

One descendant of the action body should have a template.XULAttr("uri") attribute set to the member variable. This element and its descendants may use variables in place of attribute values. Variables are a question mark followed by a name. For a matched rule, each variable will be a reference to data within the datasource, determined from the query. If the same variable appears multiple times, it will have the same value in each place.
